data.title: Doon Mackichan « Hamilton Hodell's Blog
data.meta_description: Posts about Doon Mackichan written by Hamilton Hodell
data.text:
The holiday season is just around the corner, so here’s wishing you all a very Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year from everyone here at Hamilton Hodell! As always, below you will find your festive guide to this season’s HH treats, with listings for all upcoming films, television programmes and theatre shows starring Hamilton Hodell clients over the […]

BBC Two’s comedy series Two Doors Down returns to Latimer Crescent this week for a new six-part series, starring our hilarious and brilliant DOON MACKICHAN as one of the series leads. Episode One premieres tomorrow night, Friday 1 April at 10pm on BBC Two. Originally airing back in January 2014 as a one-off episode set in […]

With Christmas and the holidays just around the corner, we want to take this opportunity to wish you all a very Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year from everyone here at Hamilton Hodell! Below is your festive guide to this season’s HH treats, with listings for all upcoming films, television programmes and theatre shows […]

Mountain Goats is a brand new six-part BBC comedy series set around the antics of a ragtag group of Mountain Rescue volunteers. The first episode airs tomorrow night, Friday 14th August at 10:35pm on BBC One, starring HH client KEVIN MAINS as one of the series leads. The show celebrates the Highlands of Scotland, with […]

DOON MACKICHAN will be speaking at 2014’s HowTheLightGetsIn, the world’s largest philosophy and music festival. This year’s festival takes place in May, bringing together world-leading scientists, musicians, philosophers and politicians including Roger Penrose, Bernard-Henri Levy, Laurie Penny, Charlotte Church, George Galloway, David Nutt, Katie Derham, Molotov Jukebox, Owen Jones and Mr. Scruff for debates, talks […]

Make sure you tune in tonight for the final episode of The Great Sport Relief Bake Off – the charity version of the BBC’s hugely popular reality television contest The Great British Bake Off. Tonight’s episode features our very own DOON MACKICHAN as one of the final quartet of celebrity contestants. Watch DOON as she pulls on her […]

Wishing you all a very Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year from everyone here at Hamilton Hodell! Below is your festive guide to this season’s HH treats, with listings for all upcoming movies, television programmes and theatre shows starring Hamilton Hodell clients over the holiday season. So be sure to tune in, set your […]

Coming soon to BBC4 – Quick Cuts, starring DOON MACKICHAN. This brand new 3-part comedy series is a quick-cutting sitcom crossed with a sketch show, set in a hairdressing salon. The owner of ‘Quick Cuts’ is Sue (played by DOON), who turns a blind eye to the various faults, failings and eccentricities of her staff. […]

The longlist nominations are out for the 2013 TVChoice Awards. Congratulations to all nominated HH clients and the shows in which they star, listed below. As always, the awards are open to the public vote, so you decide on the winners. You have until 14th June to cast your first round votes. So check out […]

Plebs is a brand new modern comedy for ITV2, set in Ancient Rome and starring DOON MACKICHAN. Rome is traditionally imagined as the home of emperors and senators, generals and gladiators, a dignified theatre of pomp and ceremony. But what about the little guys, the wasters – new to the big city, stuck in office […]

The 2012 Olivier nominations have just been announced this afternoon. Huge congratulations go to BERTIE CARVEL and NIGEL LINDSAY, both nominated for Best Actor In A Musical. BERTIE is nominated for his performance as Miss. Trunchbull in Matilda The Musical at the Cambridge Theatre. NIGEL is nominated for his performance as Shrek in Shrek The […]

Intruders (starring KERRY FOX) and Acts Of Godfrey, starring (DOON MACKICHAN) are both released in UK cinemas this week. Director Juan Carlos Fresnadillo’s new English-language horror thriller Intruders is one of the most hotly anticipated Spanish films of the year. Based on a script by Nicolás Casariego and Jaime Marqués, it tells the terrifying story […]

The shortlist nominations have been announced this week for the 2012 Whatsonstage.com Awards. Big congratulations to all our nominated clients and the productions they starred in. Public voting is now open and you can visit the Whatsonstage.com Awards page to cast your vote. Below is a list of all our clients and productions which have […]

SAMANTHA SPIRO and DOON MACKICHAN are currently starring in two separate London shows, each of which has received rave reviews both for the production and the leading performances. SAMANTHA SPIRO stars in Chicken Soup With Barley at the The Royal Court Theatre. **** “ Samantha Spiro is beyond praise as Sarah, showing you a warm […]
